h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Violet Hail Transformation Location
content: With the item, you can then take it back to Daoist Mi and fight him. Upon his defeat, he will give you the Transformation. Despite his imposing form, he is a complete pushover, really. For a full breakdown of his attacks, be sure to check out our Daoist Mi boss page.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Hail_(Transformation).md', within the main section titled 'Violet Hail (Transformation)', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Violet Hail Transformation Location'.
The content is as follows:
With the item, you can then take it back to Daoist Mi and fight him. Upon his defeat, he will give you the Transformation. Despite his imposing form, he is a complete pushover, really. For a full breakdown of his attacks, be sure to check out our Daoist Mi boss page.
